text: ( Source : Drury University ) October 8, 2015 by Mike Brothers •Releases • Tags: Alumni Reunion , convocation, speakers SPRINGFIELD, Mo., Oct. 8, 2015 - At today's inaugural Alumni Convocation, noted children's author and community leader David
